ModMetaData.name: Dragon's Fertile Fields Regrowth Patches
ModMetaData.author: DragonKing
ModMetaData.description:
<size=24>"Features"</size> This mod patches Regrowth to be terraformed with Fertile Fields.
<size=24>Why did I make this?</size> Cause biomes are cool, and mod compatibility is even cooler.
<size=24>What is Included/changed?</size> I have added appropriate tags to the various terrain defs so that you can terraform them when Fertile Fields is present.
<size=24>What this does not do</size> Though you can convert the modded terrain to vanilla terrain, you cannot do it in reverse.
<size=24>How to use this</size> I always suggest that you put patches towards the bottom of your modlist.
